survey_name: Employee Preferences for Workplace Flexibility Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee preferences and satisfaction levels regarding workplace flexibility options offered by their organization.

questions.question_text: Which of the following workplace flexibility options does your organization currently offer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Ensure the options cover common flexibility arrangements.
